thread.title: Festivals in July include mangoes, kids and gospel music
thread.title_full: Festivals in July include mangoes, kids and gospel music | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: palmbeachpost
title: Festivals in July include mangoes, kids and gospel music
text:
1. Coral Gables
Mango Festival: Mangos of Jamaica, 9:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Saturday to July 12 at the Fairchild Tropical Botanical Garden at 10901 Old Cutler Road. Shop all things mango including mango trees, fruit, art and merchandise. There will be mango culinary demonstrations as well as activities for kids. Info: 305-667-1651; www.fairchildgarden.org
Mango festival in Coral Gables 2. Melbourne
Space Coast Baby & Kids Expo, 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Saturday at the Melbourne Auditorium at 625 E. Hibiscus Blvd. Bring your kids to participate in fun activities such as crafts, bounce houses and face painting. Learn about child care, health and wellness, and other family topics. Info: 803-800-2044; www.carolinafamilyexpos.com
3. Orange City
Gospel Fest, 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. Saturday at Coleman Park at 200 E. Blue Spring Ave. This is an outdoor festival including live gospel music, food and craft vendors. For kids, there will be bounce houses and water slides. The event is open for everyone. Info: 407-243-7619; www.southfest.com
</span
